thread.section_title: Hotel Tourisme Avenue - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Made our 1st time to Paris a lot easier
thread.title_full: Made our 1st time to Paris a lot easier - Review of Hotel Tourisme Avenue, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Stelios I
title: Made our 1st time to Paris a lot easier
text: I would totally recommend this hotel, due to its very convenient location (15minutes walk to the Aiffel Tower, 1minute walk to the Motte-Piquette metro station. Also, excellent service, very friendly reception! Internet is an issue though. Connects and disconnects all the time. Very rich breakfast, all delicious! Its rooms are far better than what you expect to get for a 3 stars category hotel. A huge variety of small cafes and bistros around the hotel, quite expensive though. In general, this hotel made my first visit to Paris quite easier in everything and added a nice memory to my carnet!
